text: Farawo adati, “Kodi inu mwakhulupirira mwa iye pamene ine sindinakupatseni chilolezo? Ndithudi iye ndi mtsogoleri wanu amene adakuphunzitsani matsenga. Ndithudi posachedwapa mudzazindikira. Ndithudi ine ndidzadula manja anu ndi miyendo yanu moisiyanitsa. Ndidzakudulani dzanja lamanja ndi mwendo wamanzere ndiponso ndidzakupachikani pa mtanda.”
